mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET ANSWER = #{adminAnswer}, ANSWERED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE QNA_ID = #{qna_id}
mapper.select: SELECT q.QNA_ID AS qna_id, q.PRODUCT_ID AS product_id, q.USER_ID AS user_id, q.TITLE AS title, q.CONTENT AS content, q.ANSWER AS answer, CASE WHEN q.ANSWERED_AT IS NOT NULL THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변대기' END AS STATUS, u.NAME AS user_name, p.PRD_NAME AS prd_name FROM QNA q LEFT JOIN USER_TABLE u ON q.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON q.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE q.DELETED_AT IS NULL ORDER BY q.QNA_ID DESC

SELECT q.QNA_ID, q.PRODUCT_ID, q.USER_ID, q.TITLE, q.CONTENT, q.ANSWER, CASE WHEN q.ANSWERED_AT IS NOT NULL THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변대기' END AS STATUS, u.NAME AS USER_NAME, p.PRD_NAME AS PRD_NAME FROM QNA q LEFT JOIN USER_TABLE u ON q.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON q.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE q.QNA_ID = #{qna_id}
